snippet: New York City’s police commissioner defends the use of Tasers, saying they reduce the risk of injury or death for those taken into custody....
abstract: Letter from New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton comments on July 28 article on growing use of Taser guns by NYC police.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s police commissioner defends the use of Tasers, saying they reduce the risk of injury or death for those taken into custody.
